body:
My CI build failed like so:

```
==> Installing libtiff
==> Fetching file:///tmp/apps-build-mirror.55e1sE/mirror/libtiff/libtiff-4.0.8.tar.gz
==> Staging archive: /scratch/hartzelg/spack-cime-sc1-working-dir/workspace/sc1-daily-build/spack/var/spack/stage/libtiff-4.0.8-iaxe3tnkwwhupjmyxbcnrdoarbfkinzb/tiff-4.0.8.tar.gz
==> Created stage in /scratch/hartzelg/spack-cime-sc1-working-dir/workspace/sc1-daily-build/spack/var/spack/stage/libtiff-4.0.8-iaxe3tnkwwhupjmyxbcnrdoarbfkinzb
==> No patches needed for libtiff
==> Building libtiff [AutotoolsPackage]
==> Executing phase: 'autoreconf'
==> Executing phase: 'configure'
==> Executing phase: 'build'
==> Executing phase: 'install'
==> Successfully installed libtiff
  Fetch: 0.01s.  Build: 11.30s.  Total: 11.31s.
[+] /scratch/hartzelg/spack-cime-sc1-working-dir/workspace/sc1-daily-build/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-5.4.0/libtiff-4.0.8-iaxe3tnkwwhupjmyxbcnrdoarbfkinzb
==> Error: Specs passed to a DirectoryLayout must be concrete!
```
title: Error: Specs passed to a DirectoryLayout must be concrete!
